topic.title: 친구와 함께 처음으로 쿠키 굽기
topic.description: 친구와 함께 레시피를 보며 처음으로 쿠키를 구워보는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 응, 우리가 재료를 다 넣었는지 확실히 해야 해.
설탕이랑 버터는 넣었고, 이제 밀가루를 체에 쳐서 넣을 차례야.
응, 이제 오븐에 넣고 15분만 기다리면 돼. 냄새가 정말 좋다!

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Shall we check the recipe one more time?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Shall we check the recipe | one more time?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, we need to make sure if we've added all the ingredients.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | we need to make sure || if we've added all the ingredients.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: We put in the sugar and butter, and now it's time to sift in the flour.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: We put in the sugar and butter, | and now it's time to sift in the flour.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I should be careful so the dough doesn't get too sticky.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I should be careful | so the dough doesn't get too sticky.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, now we just need to put it in the oven and wait for 15 minutes. It smells so good!
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | now we just need to put it in the oven | and wait for 15 minutes. || It smells so good!

keyword_speeches.target_sentence: Shall we check the recipe to make sure if we've added all the ingredients? Now it's time to sift in the flour.
I should be careful with the dough. Is the oven preheated?
We just need to wait for 15 minutes. It smells so good!
Shall we check the recipe one more time? Have we added all the ingredients? Is the oven preheated?
